pullRequest.title: [BEAM-11074] Improve process for adding GPG keys to KEYS.
pullRequest.bodyText:
This both adjusts the script so that PMC-hood isn't needed for adding keys to dev/KEYS, and adjusts the instructions in the release guide to add manual instructions for the process, based on the steps in the script. The instructions at the top of the KEYS file (the current recommendation) are a bit obtuse.

Thank you for your contribution! Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily:

 Choose reviewer(s) and mention them in a comment (R: @username).
 Format the pull request title like [BEAM-XXX] Fixes bug in ApproximateQuantiles, where you replace BEAM-XXX with the appropriate JIRA issue, if applicable. This will automatically link the pull request to the issue.
 Update CHANGES.md with noteworthy changes.
 If this contribution is large, please file an Apache Individual Contributor License Agreement.

See the Contributor Guide for more tips on how to make review process smoother.

commit.message:
[BEAM-11074] Improve process for adding GPG keys to KEYS.

This both adjusts the script so that PMC-hood isn't needed for adding keys to dev/KEYS, and adjusts the instructions in the release guide to add manual instructions for the process, based on the steps in the script. The instructions at the top of the KEYS file (the current recommendation) are a bit obtuse.

nodes.bodyText: I'm not sure we need a "Run all commands manually" section at all if we have the script. Duplicating everything is cumbersome both to read and to edit. (BEAM-10048)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -135,7 +135,20 @@ __NOTE__: When generating the key, please make sure you choose the key type as _
 
   Here, the key ID is the 8-digit hex string in the `pub` line: `845E6689`.
 
-  Now, add your Apache GPG key to the Beam’s `KEYS` file both in [`dev`](https://dist.apache.org/repos/dist/dev/beam/KEYS) and [`release`](https://dist.apache.org/repos/dist/release/beam/KEYS) repositories at `dist.apache.org`. Follow the instructions listed at the top of these files. (Note: Only PMC members have write access to the release repository. If you end up getting 403 errors ask on the mailing list for assistance.)
+* Add your Apache GPG key to the Beam’s `KEYS` file both in

commit.message:
[BEAM-11074] Removing manual steps for GPG keys.

The manual steps just mirror the contents of the script, so instead it now suggests referencing the script itself for manual steps.
